cz.cuni.mff.kocur.server

Class TimeManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.cuni.mff.kocur.server.TimeManager

  • public class TimeManager
extends Object
    Class that is supposed to handle time. It should be synchronized with the in-game time. The time should by update by team updates, that will contain the time information. That means the tick will be around on second. The goal of this class is to manage time depended events as spawning camps or runes.
    Author:
    kocur

    • Field Detail

      • logger

        private static final org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger logger
        Logger registers for TimeManager

      • TIME_CONSTANT

        public static float TIME_CONSTANT
        We need to have a small time constant. We will delay the respawns by this constant, because it seems there is a small delay in game between the spawn time and the actual spawning.

      • lastCampRespawn

        protected float lastCampRespawn
        Last time we respawned camps.

        Period of rune respawns.

      • nextEvent

        protected float nextEvent
        When should the next respawn event occur.

      • preGameLength

        protected static final int preGameLength
        90s is beginning of the game. The creeps spawn after that period and so do the events.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • getElapsedTime

        public static float getElapsedTime()
        Returns:
        Returns a time that occured from the first time that the creeps were spawned.

      • getGameTime

        public static float getGameTime()
        Returns:
        Returns game time.

      • getLocalGameStartTime

        public static long getLocalGameStartTime()
        Returns:
        Returns local time, that corresponds to the moment when the game started.

        time - New local game start time.

      • getLocalTime

        public static float getLocalTime()
        Returns:

      • doTimeUpdates

        public void doTimeUpdates(float time)
        Updates all the camps, runes etc. if the time is right.
        Parameters:
        time - Time (elapsed)

      • updateCamps

        Updates the camps if the time is right.
        Parameters:
        time - Time.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the camps were respawned.

      • getOffset

        public static float getOffset()
        Returns:
        Returns the offset. That is a duration of the game pauses.

      • setOffset

        public static void setOffset(float offset)
        Sets a new offset.
        Parameters:
        offset - New offset.

      • frameworkPaused

        public static void frameworkPaused()
        Should be called after the game paused. Stores time of the pause.

      • frameworkUnpaused

        public static void frameworkUnpaused()
        Should be called after the framework was unpaused. Changes the offset.
